timeline.bodyText: Could you please remove the System.out.println ?
timeline.author: ppalaga

replies.bodyText: The last issue from my PoV.
replies.author: ppalaga

timeline.bodyText: Unless /round is doing something not covered by the above /marshal /unmarshal endpoints, I'd vote for removing it.
timeline.author: ppalaga

replies.bodyText: I was testing if marshaled message could be also un-marshaled. I had some issues with that so I kept it there.
replies.author: mmelko

timeline.bodyText:
It looks like /marshal-soap12 and /marshal differ only in the name of the direct endpoint. Could we perhaps have just one rest endpoint with a route URI param, something like https://github.com/apache/camel-quarkus/blob/master/integration-tests/dataformat/src/main/java/org/apache/camel/quarkus/component/dataformat/it/DataformatResource.java#L43-L57
And the same for unmarshal
